entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
